Italian fashion designer Roberto Cavalli.content: Italian fashion designer¬†Roberto¬†Cavalli, known for his animal-print designs loved by showbusiness stars, has died at the age of 83, his company said.Cavalli's funeral will be held in Florence on Monday, Italian media reported.The designer died on Friday at his home in Florence, Italian news agency ANSA reported.The Florence-based fashion group is owned by Auriel Investment SA, controlled by Dubai's Hussain Sajwani who rescued it in 2019."You will be missed and you are loved by so many that your name will continue on, a beacon of inspiration for others, and especially for me," said¬†Roberto¬†Cavalli's creative director Fausto Puglisi.

Channing Tatum and Jenna Dewan list each.content:
"

According to reports, the duo will face off in court on April 12 to discuss the division of property which includes profit share of Magic Mike - an IP, reimbursement claims, support, breach of fiduciary duty and attorneys' fees and other costs.In court documents ¬†filed on April 9, Dewan ‚Äì who married Tatum in July 2009 before filing for divorce in 2018 ‚Äì wants her ex to "testify regarding all issues related to the parties' marriage including business and financial activities.Channing Tatum and Jenna Dewan have listed each other to testify as witnesses in the divorce trial."While this case has been pending for some time, it is Jenna‚Äôs contention that the cause of the delay is (Channing's) refusal to accept an equal division of the ‚ÄòMagic Mike' intellectual property.After 6 years of deliberations, the former couple will now finalise their divorce.

Emraan Hashmi and Mallika Sherawat reuni.content: The erotic thriller was a remake of the Hollywood film Unfaithful and featured Mallika Sherawat, Emraan Hashmi and Ashmit Patel in the lead.It's been two decades since the film came out and it seems the duo have buried their hatchet¬†and reconciled.Mallika and Emraan shared a sizzling chemistry on screen but never featured in any other film together as they were at loggerheads while shooting for the film.It was after the film I think during promotions or something we had a misunderstanding.It was so uncalled for and so childish on my part also,‚Äù she had said.

Taylor Swift songs return to TikTok fina.content: ‚ÄùThis update comes just in time as Taylor Swift is ready to release her next studio album, The Tortured Poets Department.It‚Äôs possible that Taylor Swift has made this breakthrough happen between the parties and that she partners with TikTok to promote her upcoming album.As of now, multiple Taylor Swift‚Äôs hit numbers like ‚ÄúYou Belong With Me,‚Äù ‚ÄúLover,‚Äù ‚ÄúCardigan,‚Äù ‚ÄúMirrorball,‚Äù ‚ÄúFearless (Taylor‚Äôs Version),‚Äù ‚ÄúCruel Summer,‚Äù ‚ÄúCardigan,‚Äù ‚ÄúStyle (Taylor‚Äôs Version),‚Äù ‚ÄúIs It Over Now?Taylor Swift‚Äôs songs have finally returned to TikTok after a gap of 10 weeks.(Taylor‚Äôs Version),‚Äù ‚ÄúThe Man‚Äù and ‚ÄúME!‚Äù

Prince William enjoys soccer match with.content: This was Prince George's first public¬†outing since¬†Christmas 2023 and Kate's cancer diagnosis revelation.At the Villa Park stands the father and son duo was captured enjoying the nail-biting match between Aston Villan and Lille in the Europa Conference League quarter-final first leg in Birmingham.Both William and George looked elated as their favourite club registered¬†a win by 2-1 in the first leg of the Europa Conference League quarter-final.Prince William and his son Prince George had a fun day out as they enjoyed the Aston Villa match.com/QPHR6a6yF0On March 31, Prince William and Kate Middleton skipped the annual Easter Sunday church service due to Kate's cancer diagnosis and ongoing treatment.

OJ Simpson and Kardashians relationship.content: Back then, Robert Kardashian, a close friend and lawyer to Simpson, became a central figure in the trial and brought national attention to his family which were just experimenting with ideas to burst into fame.After marrying Robert, Kris became the best friend of Simpson‚Äôs late ex-wife Brown Simpson.OJ Simpson found himself embroiled in a high-profile trial for a double murder that included a televised car chase and what not.Of course this led to factions since Robert Kardashian became close to OJ Simpson and Robert‚Äôs wife Kris sided with Nicole.The scandalous legacy of OJ SimpsonIt all got murky when in June 1994, OJ Simpson became embroiled in a double murder charge for the deaths of his ex-wife Nicole Brown Simpson and her friend Ron Goldman.

Love Sex Aur Dhokha 2 trailer out! Dibak.content: Before the release of the film's teaser, Dibakar shared a video on social media¬†to clarify that he was going to show the truth in the film, no matter how dark."Meanwhile, Ektaa Kapoor¬†recently shared in a Variety interview that she intends to go into hiding after LSD 2's release because of trolls and hate comments.Drawing parallels to the dramatic setups of reality TV shows like Bigg Boss, Love Sex Aur Dhokha 2¬†sheds light on the complexities of modern relationships and self-discovery in the digital age.Additionally, the film sheds light on the challenges faced by a trans person and delves into the dark side of social media, stressing how an obsession with online clout can have devastating consequences.So, if you are in that fashion, then I can give you a disclaimer that you should not watch the LSD 2 teaser or trailer.

Tamil actor and politician Arulmani dies.content: The actor, who was known for his roles in movies such as Thandavakone, Lingaa, and Azhagi¬†died after suffering a heart attack in Chennai.Actors Seshu, Daniel Balaji and Visheshwar Rao¬†passed away recently due to a heart attack.Arulmani was a well-known name in the Tamil film industry.Arulmani's death has come as another¬†shock to the Tamil industry which has seen frequent deaths of celebrities.He suffered a heart attack after he arrived at his Chennai home when he was resting.

Wait, what? Kourtney Kardashian 'pounded.content: This isn't the first time a Kardashian has confessed to drinking breast milk to cure an illness.Kourtney Kardashian took to Instagram on April 10 to reveal an unconventional remedy for feeling unwell: drinking breast milk, presumably her own.Sharing a selfie on her Instagram Stories, Kardashian wrote, "I just pounded a glass of breast milk because I feel sick.Back in 2013, Kourtney's younger sister Kim revealed on an episode of Keeping Up With the Kardashians that she tried breast milk to treat psoriasis.While the benefits of breast milk for infants are well-researched and well-documented, it is not known if it is equally beneficial for adults.

Travis Kelce grooves to Taylor Swift's S.content: üîâ| During New Heights live: Name that Tune and the tune is Shake It Off.In a TikTok video posted on Thursday, April 11, Kelce is seen shaking a leg on stage to the tune of Taylor Swift's hit song "Shake It Off".com/7jjegM13bgPrior to the live taping, Kelce had shared on the podcast that he was still amazed at how he ended up dating Taylor Swift.The couple confirmed their relationship the following month when they were spotted holding hands at a Saturday Night Live afterparty in New York City.Kelce was at the University of Cincinnati's Fifth Third Arena to shoot a segment for his¬†New Heights with Jason and Travis Kelce podcast.

JK Rowling won't forgive Daniel Radcliff.content: "Shortly after Radcliffe released a statement in 2020, Watson tweeted, "Trans people are who they say they are and deserve to live their lives without being constantly questioned or told they aren‚Äôt who they say they are.Any statement to the contrary erases the identity and dignity of transgender people and goes against all advice given by professional health care associations who have far more expertise on this subject matter than either Jo or I.The post read, "Just waiting for Dan and Emma to give you a very public apology ‚Ä¶ safe in the knowledge that you will forgive them."Things escalated when a netizen brought up Harry Potter stars Daniel Radcliffe and Emma Watson, who have publicly supported transgender rights in the past.I want my trans followers to know that I and so many other people around the world see you, respect you and love you for who you are.

Amar Singh Chamkila Review: Imtiaz Ali's.content: While Chamkila's original songs are all there and performed live by the two actors, AR Rahman infuses soulful music as well as forms an important part of storytelling.With the help of real-life footage of the two singers, their photos and animations, Imtiaz Ali creates a fascinating and immersive experience that captivates your attention in every frame.He was accused of singing vulgar songs yet it was these songs that made him connect with people the most¬†In Imtiaz Ali's film, singer-actor Diljit Dosanjh transforms himself to play the man who became an enigma in North India in a short period and one whose assassination remains still unresolved nearly four decades later.It is about the loneliness that the protagonist feels throughout his lifetime, even when he has reached giddy heights of stardom It is about two artists who provided so much happiness in times of unrest and riots through their music yet were mere providers for their families and loved ones- and nothing else.A chance meeting with local star Jinda who ropes him to write lyrics for his music provides the gateway to the world of akharas and music- a world that he has been yearning to be a part of.

'Bravo': Priyanka Chopra is all praise f.content: Set in India, the film follows a man on a revenge spree against the corrupt officials of a right-wing political party.Priyanka Chopra Jonas recently took to social media to reveal that she is truly impressed by Dev Patel's directorial debut Monkey Man.Actress Sobhita Dhulipala, who plays the role of Sita in Monkey Man, replied to Priyanka on her Instagram stories.Monkey Man out in theatres worldwide, go watch.Monkey Man sometimes tries to do too much at once, but I appreciate that it forced me to look up some of the cultural context.

Judge dismisses lawsuits filed against r.content: The families of the 10 people who died during the concert, as well as hundreds who were injured, sued Drake, Scott and Live Nation ‚Äî the festival‚Äôs promoter ‚Äî as well as dozens of other individuals and entities.Hip-hop artist Drake has been dismissed from a lawsuit over the deadly 2021 Astroworld festival in Houston in which 10 people were killed, a judge has ruled.Lawyers for Drake, whose full name is Aubrey Drake Graham, had argued during a court hearing on April 1 in Houston that he was not involved in putting the concert together so was not liable for the deaths and injuries that had occurred.Drake was a special guest of rap superstar Travis Scott, who had headlined the festival.Later, when asked by an attorney for Blount‚Äôs family about whether it would be important for him to hear from those who put the concert together about why Blount died, Drake said, ‚ÄúI think I would want answers for what happened, yes.

CinemaCon 2024: First footage of Anthony.content: On Thursday (April 11) at a CinemaCon¬†presentation, Marvel boss Kevin Feige gave the audience the first look at the much-anticipated MCU movie, Captain America: Brave New World.The actor played the role of Sam Wilson in the MCU world for a significant period, before he donned the mantle of Captain America.During the¬†Disney presentation, Kevin along with the new Captain America Anthony Mackie unveiled the new action-packed footage¬†of the fourth film in the Captain America franchise.For the unversed, Mackie made his MCU debut¬†in Captain America: The Winter Soldier,¬†and later appeared in several¬†Marvel films, including, Avengers: Age of Ultron,¬†Captain America: Civil War, and Avengers: Infinity War.Soon, we see Ross has been attacked by a group of people when Captain America comes to save the leader from the deadly attack.

Korean singer Park Bo Ram dies at 30; fo.content: Park Bo Ram was a well-known name in the South Korean Industry¬†and she was about to complete 10 years in the industry today.The 30-year-old star, who was known for lending her voice to popular Korean dramas, suddenly passed away on the night of April 11 in South Korea.Park Bo Ram suddenly passed away late at night on April 11.It is even more heartbreaking that we have to tell you this sudden news to all of the fans who support Park Bo Ram.‚ÄùAs per the reports, the South Namyangju Police Station revealed that Park Bo was with her friends, enjoying drinks last night.

Disney teases Mufasa's story, much befor.content: The new film, Mufasa: The Lion King is expected to focus on the early years of the ruler of the animals, as well as his vicious younger brother Scar.The film will explore the African savannah where the young lions grow up and it looks almost life-like.A young Mufasa is seen leaping over the rhinos and all other animals as a voiceover from Rafiki sets the scene for a story about ‚Äúa lion who was born without a drop of nobility in its blood‚Ä¶ a lion who would change our lives forever‚Ä¶ a lion who will shape our destiny.At the recently held CinemaCon (annual convention for movie theatre owners) in Las Vegas, Disney dropped its all-new trailer of Mufasa: The Lion King as the king of the Pride makes his return.as the younger version of Mufasa (voiced by James Earl Jones in the 1994 film and 2019 remake) and Scar (voiced by Jeremy Irons in the 1994 version and Chiwetel Ejiofor in the 2019 remake).

Explained: A murder trial, dramatic car.content: Allegedly, in one sketch, Simpson, as per the New York Post, allegedly visited a used-car lot to sell a white Ford Bronco ‚Äî the car model he used to try to flee police in a dramatic slow-speed chase after the 1994 murder of his ex-wife Nicole.In 1997, a predominately white jury in Santa Monica, California, found OJ Simpson liable for the two deaths and ordered him to pay $33.Simpson, an American football star turned actor, has left behind a controversial legacy, that boasts of a gruesome murder, police chase and "the trial of the century".Nevertheless, Simpson, who had already declared himself "absolutely 100 per cent not guilty," was acquitted of the charges on Oct 3, 1995, by a predominately black panel of 10 women and two men.The sentence was for an armed robbery OJ Simpson, along with five other men, armed with at least two guns, carried out in 2007 at a casino hotel in Las Vegas.

Coppola, Cronenberg to compete at Cannes.content: Several big-name actors are making a Cannes appearance, including Richard Gere, Uma Thurman and Jacob Elordi, who all star in director Paul Schrader's competition film "Oh, Canada", as well as Hollywood icons Nicolas Cage and Demi Moore.Directors Francis Ford Coppola, David Cronenberg and Yorgos Lanthimos will compete for the Cannes Film Festival's top prize next month, organisers said on Thursday, easing concerns that strikes in Hollywood might dim the star-studded event.The festival will kick off on a lighter note with the previously announced opening film "The Second Act," a French comedy directed by Quentin Dupieux and starring Lea Seydoux.In addition, Hollywood legend George Lucas is set to walk Cannes' seaside Croisette to receive an honorary Palme d'Or this year.Coppola will bring his long-in-the-making passion project "Megalopolis," starring Adam Driver, to the competition, while Lanthimos teams up with Emma Stone after the success of "Poor Things" with "Kinds of Kindness", and Cronenberg will pull in horror fans again with "The Shrouds" starring Vincent Cassel.
